name: I Upset Millions of Cultivators
author: 17K漫画
content: Jiang Bei accidentally travels to the Starfall Continent and acquires a cultivation system that uses anger points as a source of power. To survive and enhance his strength, Jiang Bei engages in reckless behavior daily to accumulate anger points. His brother Jiang Nan&#039s arrival introduces him to the world of cultivators. However, an unexpected incident reveals the identity of his mother as a witch, prompting Jiang Bei to embark on a journey to rescue his mother trapped in the Demon Realm.
